tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Very good doctor hemalata ma'am, friendly and treatment is too good, good explanation of the issue

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She *** **** ************* *** did a great job explaining everything so I knew what I was getting into. She’s professional and the clinic itself is very well maintained.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Hema makes you feel most comfortable & takes care of the patient needs very well .. she is empathetic towards pain & provides ultimate treatment..

if the wait time can be reduced it would be still nicer.. we feel we need to wait when we come there to the clinic.. please stick on to the time given as we would have left all our work and come over there.. and  + or - 10-15 mns not an issue but we end up waiting more than an hour sometimes !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I got new denture for my father from Dr. Hemalatha and I found she’s very friendly, very co-operative always available, caring and ready to answer all the questions, following up with us after the treatment to find any discomfort. I will definitely recommend her ....
reply_text:
Thank you Mr Manjunath ..
I wish your father , Mr Guruprasad a good oral health & a smile

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctor explained the process well so that we are comfortable with what we are getting into.  
She also e pkained alternatives with pros and cons for each.  So we can make an informed decision. 
She is Firm yet friendly.  This ensures kids follow instructions well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor is perfectionist in her work. will not compromise at any cost till she get 100% result to her satisfaction
The doctor was helpful in making understand the health issue, was easier to communicate and happy about the visit to doctor.

reply_text: Thank you for your feedback Mr Prashant Jain . We will try to keep up with the standards , to meet up to our patients’ demands .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Very experienced orthodontist . Her expertise can be seen in the way she brings about the treatment plan which is for sure to bring in the desired result .
 I have personally experienced this and would highly recommend Dr. Hema for Orthodontic issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: It is my pleasure to share something  about Dr.Hemalatha.I have never seen somebody who is so professional, patient n perfect in his/ her profession. She does her service with  utmost dedication n responsibility. We  have been treated by her  for the past 4 years with the same admiration .I feel , It is difficult to find such a  flawless orthodontist in India.she is just an exemplary n extraordinary orthodontist.
